text: One shoe (appears to be male) on the kitchen counter. You mark the location of the shoe with an appropriate description, photo, and clue number. What should be done with them next?
option1: You search for fingerprints but find nothing. You secure the clue to avoid erasing any potential traces.
option2: You ignore the presence of the shoe and do not consider it as a clue.
option3: You try on the shoe to see if it fits your foot.
option4: You walk away and do nothing.
